abstract: Brett Michael Emerton (born 22 February 1979) is a retired Australian professional footballer who played for Sydney FC, Blackburn Rovers and the Australian national team. He is the third most capped player for Australia. Able to play as a wide midfielder or defender, Emerton was known for his "speed, ball control and creativity."
